item.title: Portfolio
item.description: TEACHING What Makes a Pokémon Legendary? Use tree-based machine learning methods to identify the characteristics of legendary Pokémon. Gender Bias in Graduate Admissions Analyze admissions data from UC Berkeley and find out if the university was biased against women. WRITING Postgrad study: a new perspective from the top of the hill The Guardian, 6 Jan 2017 Reconceptualising (systematic) Ideology in the Wake of Political Psychology George Walford International Essay Prize, 9 Jul 2016
